title: RC V 42 month questionnaire (problem solving and personal social)

questions.question_text: Does your child use a fork to stab food and lift it to their mouth?
Can your child count at least 3 objects correctly?
Does your child complete simple puzzles (e.g., 4-6 pieces)?
Does your child play and share with other children?
Does your child comfort someone who is upset?
Does your child follow instructions during group play?
Does your child take turns without becoming upset?
Can your child dress themselves (excluding buttons and zippers)?
Does your child ask for help when needed?
Do you have any concerns about your child's development?
